title: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit         More than just a park for the performing arts, Wolf Trap has natural beauty too. NPS Photo  Directions & Transportation Hours & Seasons Things to Do Calendar Accessibility Inspection Process Fees & Reservations  Â    Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts offers a variety of experiences for visitors. Whether you enjoy attending a performance at the Filene Center or Theatre-in-the-Woods, walking on the park's trails or a guided program with a ranger, there are opportunities for everyone to find their place here. This portion of the website provides more information about preparing for your visit and the things you can experience during your visit. If you should have any questions, please feel free to contact the park at 703-255-1800 or e-mail us. Explore the links to plan ahead, get to the park, and make the most of your visit to Wolf Trap.
